body_html:
Hi @ispirmustafa
Here is a case:
When using Siamese network , the loss only make sense when training, So evaluation won't work because only losses returned, we want Euclidean distance or something like to actually evaluate on test data.
I think a sample solution is just passing true labels to "model_fn“.
In estimator.py line 492~495, if labels is not None, just pass to "model_fn“.

body:
Hi @ispirmustafa 
Here is a case:
 When using Siamese network ,  the loss only make sense when training,  So evaluation won't work because only  losses returned,  we want Euclidean distance or something like to actually evaluate on test data.
I think a sample solution is just passing true labels to "model_fn“.
In estimator.py  line 492~495, if labels is not None, just pass to "model_fn“.
